body_html:
Using while_loop should have similar performance characteristics as an unrolled loop (and makes your graph smaller). I think there have been issues where people make very small body functions, and then there may be some noticeable overhead.

I agree the foldl situation is less than ideal. Thanks for filing this issue, it's very clear and at the very least will help others who run into this problem. I just don't think there's a quick fix to improve the error message unfortunately. Please feel free to file a PR clarifying the docs!
body_text:
Using while_loop should have similar performance characteristics as an unrolled loop (and makes your graph smaller). I think there have been issues where people make very small body functions, and then there may be some noticeable overhead.
I agree the foldl situation is less than ideal. Thanks for filing this issue, it's very clear and at the very least will help others who run into this problem. I just don't think there's a quick fix to improve the error message unfortunately. Please feel free to file a PR clarifying the docs!
body:
Using while_loop should have similar performance characteristics as an unrolled loop (and makes your graph smaller). I think there have been issues where people make very small body functions, and then there may be some noticeable overhead.

I agree the foldl situation is less than ideal. Thanks for filing this issue, it's very clear and at the very least will help others who run into this problem. I just don't think there's a quick fix to improve the error message unfortunately. Please feel free to file a PR clarifying the docs!
